1.title: The Porn Star Killer
1.plot: In 2010, tattoo parlor owner Dennis Abrahamsen was murdered during a sex party. So what do porn stars Amanda Logue and Jason Andrews have to do with it?

2.title: Mean Girls
2.plot: When two teen girls find themselves on opposite sides of a high-school love triangle, tensions escalate to the point of murder.

3.title: The Babysitter's Secret
3.plot: An on-again-off-again Florida trailer-trash romance comes to a head when tensions flare with the baby-sitter-turned-other-woman.

4.title: The iPhone Witness
4.plot: A high-school romance goes cold, but the old boyfriend isn't going to let a new guy get in the way of his happiness.

5.title: The Quad Mom Murder
5.plot: She was a beautiful mother of four lovey quadruplets. So how did she end up dead?

6.title: The Missing Millionaire
6.plot: In 2009, casual laborer Abraham Shakespeare won a $30 million dollar lottery jackpot. A woman named Dee Dee Moore befriends him and says she wants to write a book about him. But then, Shakespeare disappears.

7.title: The Swinger's Club Hitman
7.plot: In 2007, Thomas Lee Sehorne is shot to death outside his home. Then his widow Christie Fay's takes up with a new husband, Jerry Bottorff, who they had met at a Florida swinger's club.

8.title: I Hired a Hitman?
8.plot: When an escort marries a sketchy businessman nobody guess that a hit man is going to get involved.

9.title: The Playboy and the Porn Star
9.plot: What do an 80-year-old hotel heiress, her playboy son, his stripper voodoo-priestess wife and a porn star have in common. Sex, Lies and Murder.

10.title: The Killer Clown
10.plot: An upscale Florida community is reeling after one of their own is murdered in cold blood by a gun-toting clown.

11.title: Driven to Kill
11.plot: Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned - with a Mercedes.

12.title: The Other Woman
12.plot: After the death of his wife, a millionaire Florida TV producer gets a second chance at love. But this romance could lead - to murder.

13.title: The Texas Cadet Murder
13.plot: Two military cadets have pledged eternal love, but when one gets jealous, the result is - murder.

14.title: Who Killed My Family?
14.plot: A home-schooled Texas girl goes to a traditional high school and falls for a local bad boy. When her parents threaten to tear them apart it can only lead to - murder.

15.title: The Pastor's Wife
15.plot: When a pastor falls into debt and falls for his son's girlfriend the complicated love triangle becomes a recipe for - murder.

16.title: The Soccer Mom's Secret
16.plot: The community of Grand Junction, Colorado is shocked and devastated to learn that soccer mom, Paige Birgfeld, has gone missing in 2008. Investigators begin looking for clues that may lead them to Paige's whereabouts and in the process, they discover more than they ever could have imagined. It isn't under nine years later that police are able to finally bring Paige's case to a close.

17.title: Cocaine Cowboy
17.plot: Kathleen Denson, a successful businesswoman and owner of swanky fur shops from Colorado, begins dating local playboy and ranch hand, Gerald 'Cody' Boyd. Their relationship is rather toxic in nature as they spend much of their time bingeing on booze, cocaine, and sex. The relationship takes an even kicker turn when Kathleen's store manager also strikes up a relationship with Cody. Booze, cocaine, sex, a love triangle - and before you know it, someone winds up dead.

18.title: I'll Never Tell
18.plot: The Greeley Colorado police department is overwrought with scandals and tragedy. Shawna Nelson, a 911 dispatcher, engaged in a lengthy affair with a local police officer. The twist - Shawna and her lover Ignacio Garraus are both married. Ignacio is caught cheating and shortly after someone winds up dead. The question is, who paid the ultimate price for Shawna and Ignacio's transgressions?

19.title: The Housewife Affair
19.plot: High school sweethearts, Brenda and Rob Andrew, become estranged after their marriage slowly fell apart. Brenda, a stay-at-home-mom and Sunday school teacher begins to engage in torrid affairs to fill the void her failed marriage created. Her spiraling life hits rock bottom when her husband is murdered in November 2001. With a lengthy list of possible suspects, police have to figure out who killed Rob Andrew.

20.title: The Bedroom Axe Murderer
20.plot: Long time couple Nicola Puddicombe and Dennis Hoy enter new territory when Nicola begins to openly date another woman. The odd love triangle seems to satisfy a missing piece of Nicola and Dennis' relationship, but before long, someone winds up dead. Investigators must untangle a web of lies and multiple relation-ships in order to discover who is behind the murder.

21.title: Vanished
21.plot: High school sweethearts Adam and Rose Chase seem to be living the quintessential white-picket-fence life, that is, until Adam goes missing. His disappearance seems to be a mystery until family friend and ex-cop turned private investigator, Rodney Miller is on the case. He has a hunch there is fowl play, and won't stop until he uncovers the truth.

22.title: Train of Custody
22.plot: Alice Trappler engages in a series of relationships before conceiving a child with Dan Bennett. Alice tries to hide her pregnancy after their relationship goes south. She feels Dan would be a danger to her and their child. Despite Alice's attempt to conceal the baby, Dan finds out, and they enter into a brutal custody battle. Tensions build as the custody hearing approaches until Dan is found murdered. The question is - who killed Dan Bennett.

23.title: Murderous Relations
23.plot: Stacey Castor married her high school sweetheart - but her fairy tale ends when he dies suddenly of a heart attack. In an attempt to salvage her happiness she marries a second time. Stacey's first husband is not the only one in Stacey's life who suffers an untimely death. When investigators take a deeper look into Stacey's life - what they find is stranger than fiction.

24.title: The Lady Killer
24.plot: When sex, scandal, and politics collide in upstate New York town, Poughkeepsie, the FBI and local law enforcement must come together to expose the truth. Trouble in the investigation seems endless as federal witnesses turn up dead. The race is on to untangle the chaos and find justice.

25.title: Sex Game Gone Wrong
25.plot: Anna Lisa Raymond is smart, beautiful, in love, and her career as a pharmaceutical executive is on the rise - that is, until she's murdered. Police are determined to find Anna Lisa's killer - but her case starts to go cold. Investigators must sort through sexual infidelity, lies, and ultimately uncover a wolf in sheep's clothing.

26.title: The Teacher's Affair
26.plot: Paul and Betty Jeanne Solomon have been married for 15 years, and seem to be living a wonderful life together. Paul leaves his home one evening only to return and find his wife has suffered a brutal assault that ultimately ended her life. As police hunt for Betty Jeanne's murderer, they find out sometimes things aren't always as they first appear.

27.title: Four Murders
27.plot: Proof that sometimes nothing is as it seems - two robberies that occurred in 1977 set off a chain of tragedy spanning nearly half a century. Police must start at the beginning to solve not one, not two, not three - but four murders. The question is, can police uncover the truth before the next murder?

28.title: Murder in the Family
28.plot: Sometimes love is beautiful, transcendent of all its obstacles, sometimes love is blind - maybe too blind. 20-year-old Steven and 15-year-old Alyssa met online, fell in love and had a daughter. When the relationship turned sour they gave their baby up for adoption not knowing if they would ever get to see her again. When they do - it gives serendipity a whole new meaning.

29.title: Sex, Lies & Witchcraft
29.plot: Life isn't always easy - Kevin and Heather Miller knew this all too well. Kevin lost his job at the same time Heather discovered an unplanned pregnancy. The escalating situation left Heather searching for solace - which she found in best friend Mindi Robbins. A lesbian affair, Wiccan rituals, and Belladonna come together to create a perfect storm - murder.

30.title: What Really Happened?
30.plot: Three frantic 911 calls lead police to a brutal murder scene. When the investigation begins - it seems that everyone gives a different version of the truth. When the truth seems to change from minute to minute - police only have forensic evidence to fall back on. The conclusion of the case comes down to life or death - all resting in the hands of a judge.

31.title: The Bodybuilder's Secret
31.plot: Craig Titus and Kelly Ryan are superstars of the bodybuilding and fitness circuit in Las Vegas. They are the quintessential power couple, but when you add, drugs, sex, parties, and the over-the-top lifestyle of the Las Vegas strip - everything seems to be on serious - literally.

32.title: The Showgirl Murder
32.plot: Successful businessman, Jay Orbin meets ex-Vegas-showgirl Marjorie Orbin and they enter into a whirlwind romance. Life seems to be going smoothly until Jay fails to return home after a business trip. Marjorie starts engaging in suspicious behavior that pushes this missing persons case to the top of Arizona police's priority list.

33.title: The Vegas Black Widow
33.plot: Ron and Margaret Rudin are each 4 times married and four times divorced when they marry in 1987. Ron is a wealthy but frugal businessman, and Margaret owns an antique shop. Their marriage had it's share of problems and really started to sour after jealousy, bugged phone lines, and rumors of infidelity took their toll. The question becomes - will they make it out of this 5th marriage alive?

34.title: The Stripper and the Millionaire
34.plot: Rick Chance, TV pitch man and owner of Empire Glass - an auto glass company- is a self made multi-millionaire. While he is a business tycoon, he is also reckless. Chance fails to show up to a scheduled TV shoot - and his business associates begin to wonder if his life in the fast lane has come to a halt.

35.title: Yoga and Murder
35.plot: Michael Dojaquez is a free spirited ladies man who is lucky enough to have found his passion in life - yoga. He begins dating one of his yoga students, Amber, only to find out later that she is hiding some dark secrets. Namaste? Not today.

36.title: The Sergeant's Wife
36.plot: Nathan and Michelle Paet are high school sweethearts who marry and start a family together. Nathan fights in the Iraq war and is lucky enough to return home where he works at the Nellis Air Force base in Las Vegas, NV. Unfortunately he finds out that returning home might be an even more dangerous battlefield than the one he just survived.

37.title: The Boyfriend
37.plot: Laura and Craig Stelmasek are living the quintessential all-American life until their family hits a financial rough patch. Police receive a tip of a suspicious van at the Phoenix Arizona airport parking lot, leading them to the Stelmasek residence. They arrive to find a 16-year-old girl home alone and both of her parents missing. What they discover inside the van is something they never anticipated. Investigators must follow a trail of clues that start with the abandoned van and ultimately lead them to a cold-blooded killer.

38.title: All In
38.plot: A wealthy lesbian lusts over a young college girl and lavishes her with the finer things in life. The unrequited love leads to excess, drugs, and a twisted love triangle with a man who would do anything for sex and money - which includes murder.

39.title: The Conspiracy
39.plot: A Navy dropout is the target of a couples twisted desire to indulge in a gruesome fantasy. They are fueled by money, lies and a litany of delusions all resulting in a tragic murder.

40.title: Jodi Arias
40.plot: The gruesome discovery of murdered 31-year-old Travis Alexander is something that many will be unable to forget. His killer unknowingly leaves clues that lead homicide detectives down a dark and twisted path of sex, lies, and ultimately - murder.
